importOlympiaAccounts_scanQR_instruction: Scan the QR code shown in the Export section of the Radix Desktop Wallet for Olympia.
importOlympiaAccounts_accountsToImport_s: The following accounts will be imported into this Radix Wallet.
importOlympiaAccounts_verifySeedPhrase_s: To complete importing your accounts, please view your seed phrase in the Radix Desktop Wallet and enter the words here.
importOlympiaAccounts_verifySeedPhrase_w: This will give this Radix Wallet control of your accounts. Never give your seed phrase to anyone for any reason.
importOlympiaAccounts_verifySeedPhrase_k: Do not throw away this seed phrase! You will still need it if you need to recover access to your Olympia accounts in the future.
importOlympiaAccounts_completion_explana: Your Accounts live on the Radix Network and you can access them anytime in your Wallet.
importOlympiaAccounts_noNewAccounts: No new accounts were found on this Ledger device
importOlympiaAccounts_noAddresses: No addresses verified. The currently connected Ledger device is not related to any accounts to be imported, or has already been used.
